strings.Value: "We could use your help fighting the bandits."
"The bandits here bother you as much as Svetlana and Oleg â€” maybe more. Help us get rid of them for good!"
{n}A frail, disheveled old man wearing a stained and tattered robe gives you a gloomy look.{/n} "I'm Bokken, local herbalist. What brings you here?"
"Where's this coming from? You want an old man like me to fight? Here, take this potion. Consider that my help in your fight."

{n}Bokken scratches his head, then hums to himself and puffs his chest out.{/n} "Well, all right! I'll show those troublemakers! They'll learn better than to chase an old man around. Someone might even write up some verses about me. Maybe even heroic ones!"
"I'd rather sit in the bushes and watch you and Oleg beat the daylights out of those thugs. Watching from a distance is more fun, you know?"
{n}Linzi gives you a worried glance, then turns to Bokken.{/n} "Please be careful. Go ahead and help, but leave the heroics to us, you hear?"
"Good thing I don't worship him, then. Didn't get to my age by picking fights!"
